articles.title: Centre now largest Vodafone Idea shareholder as firm gives it 33.4% stake - Business Standard
articles.description: Operational and management control of the company will remain with existing promoters
articles.content:
Vodafone Idea, on Tuesday, issued 16,130 million equity shares to the central government, giving it a 33.4 per cent stake in the company.
